title: I’m the Rival Character, so I’ll Do My Best! - Novel Updates
tags: Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Oneshot   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reverse Harem
author: Chatora   茶トラ
description:
I reincarnated as a rival character in my favorite otome game.

I will do my best to polish myself to become the strongest rival character to support Heroine-chan’s love.

Well, it’s time to check the parameters as usual…

Hmm? There seems to be something wrong??>
